title: 2015 season rewards
body: Gggg riot.If you feed like shit you wont get banned.But if you say gg wp noobs you will get banned for 7 days.Also i wont get any borders that i worked so hard.Riot is really soulless.You just lost 1 player Riot.Gg noobs,Gg

replies.body:
you've obviously not read the new things riot has been adding regarding intentional feeders.

and saying GG WP NOOBS, is no different from saying "you suck/terrible/L2P" or "ezwin"

it helps nobody.

maybe you learnt a valuable lesson today from this.
Nah,Riot suck.If i dont get borders,theyre going to regret it.

> [{quoted}](name=WeedIsBack,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=InNT7vWn,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-11-09T03:11:37.877+0000)
>
> Nah,Riot suck.If i dont get borders,theyre going to regret it.

Regret it, huh.
If they think anybody has learned a lesson from this,theyre wrong.People are going to be more toxic cuz of it

> [{quoted}](name=WeedIsBack,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=InNT7vWn,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-09T03:17:10.564+0000)
>
> If they think anybody has learned a lesson from this,theyre wrong.People are going to be more toxic cuz of it

Well, I mean, they can either learn from it or get banned. And you got banned, I assume, soooo....
Believe it or not,this was my first banned from toxicity.I played 3 years from now

> [{quoted}](name=WeedIsBack,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=InNT7vWn,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-09T03:24:29.104+0000)
>
> Believe it or not,this was my first banned from toxicity.I played 3 years from now

Well, you shouldn't have been toxic, or you would have gotten your rewards.
Nah im going to suicide,its the only way
Yep, you won't get banned for having a bad game. You can get banned for being rude to your teammates.
Wait,so you want to tell me having a 2/25 is a bad game?That is obivously feeding like hell.
being a dick is the same as being a dick

must ... inflate ... self e-penzor ... by ... putting .. down .. others ...

cannot .. resist ... urge ..

must .. call .. them... nooooooobbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbsssssssssssss !!!!!!!!!!!



must ... tell .. others ... how ... my .. self e-penz0r is now hurt .. cos .... i got ... banned ..

plz ... cri .. four .... meeehhhh !! rito pls
You will never get banned for saying just ggwp noobs, i doubt even a chat restriction, you clearly said worse things then that.
